eclasstool.model.drawingtools

Interface Edge

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEdge, LineEdge

    public interface Edge
extends java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    An edge in a graph.
